channel.title: Synthetics Overview on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in Synthetics Overview on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: Synthetics Home Page
item.description: Click on Synthetics in the main menu. This will bring us to the Synthetics Home Page. It has 3 distinct sections that provide either useful information or allow you to pick or create a Synthetic Test. Onboarding Pane: Training videos and links to documentation to get you started with Splunk Synthetics. Test Pane: List of all the tests that are configured (Browser, API and Uptime) Create Test Pane: Drop-down for creating new Synthetic tests.
